text:
DeepMap | HD Maps for self-driving cars | Palo Alto, CA | ONSITE | Full-time | Engineering | https://www.deepmap.ai/

Our mission is to build revolutionary high definition mapping and localization services for self-driving cars. Business Insider ranked DeepMap as one of the top 17 startups launched in 2017 and one of the top 50 startups that will boom in 2018.

We are looking for people with interests in computer vision, deep learning, large-scale data processing, and of course maps! More information here: https://www.deepmap.ai/careers

If you have questions, email careers@deepmap.ai our reach out to me personally gregcoombe [at] deepmap.ai
